title: Gold+ Skin will be Victorious Kalista.
body:
Calling it now.

Riot said it would be a Marksman and Kalista is like perma ban in Ranked play because you can't really contest Dragon and Baron when she's on them because her Rend is so huge there's no point trying to force a fight and out-smite her Rend and there's no point contesting an Objective because her team will just hold you off then most likely escape and you'll in a lot of cases basically just sacrifice one Champion for an objective which is basically a win.

replies.body: Hell sick too because they have Blood moon Thresh and Blood Moon Kalista and now there will be Championship Kalista and Championship Thresh.

Yeah that totally wasn't called 2 months ago or anything

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/0j17bVrp-victorious-skin-is-a-marksman
They teased Victorious Vayne. Last comment in the pic...

That'd be sick too lol I hope it's not Varus, I don't like playing him because most of what he does is Q snipe or run in and auto after an ultimate, where Kalista and Vayne have 5x as much diversity in their plays and are way more fun for me personally.

When the tank meta was rumbling, I seriously considered Urgot getting the next victorious skin...

Hats off to the beautiful Victorious Urgot with a glorious bikini

as long as its not a champ i play, I'm fine with whoever gets the skin, but if riot pulls a fast one and makes it azir (my main, who is also technically classed as a marksman in game) ill be pretty mad.
